title: Lag/Delay during games after 7.4 patch
body: Ever since the new update came out, I've been having issues to play LoL. My ping hasn't changed at all but during the games I've been struggling with delays, the ones we get when we have high ping, eventually making my champ stop responding and just stand still for a couple of seconds and/or dc'ing me. Well, I'm from Brazil and play on the NA server because my gaming friends are all americans, so I tried playing on the Brazilian server and no problem, no lag, no delay at all. Hopefully you understand what I mean and have a way to help me out. Thank you in advance.

replies.body:
What you're most likely experiencing are bursts of *Packet Loss* or high packet buffering. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in order to ensure you aren't seeing these symptoms as a result of conflicting settings.

Please let me know if this resolved your issues.

I don't know if either my internet just started cooperating or if what I did really helped. I won't underestimate it, so thanks for the help.

From all the options it showed me, I set my firewall to let LoL do its thing (I've never had a problem but maybe..) and I configurated the dns.
I couldn't do the other opitions, such as packet loss check because apparently chrome doesn't support Java anymore and it won't let me actually find the "start analysis" buttom.

But hey, I've played a game with no lag/delay just now, so I assume something has indeed changed.

Thanks again for your help.
